negotiator.config

Class Configuration

  • java.lang.Object
    • negotiator.config.Configuration
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GuiConfiguration, MultilateralTournamentConfiguration

    public class Configuration
extends java.lang.Object
implements GuiConfiguration, MultilateralTournamentConfiguration
    Stores the configuration variables for the MultilateralUI user interface. This class is also readable by the TournamentManager to start a new tournament.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Configuration()
      Initializes a new instance of the configuration class.
      Configuration(Configuration config)
      Initializes a new instance of the configuration class by using existing config.

        public Configuration()
        Initializes a new instance of the configuration class.

      • Configuration

        public Configuration(Configuration config)
        Initializes a new instance of the configuration class by using existing config. Creates a shallow copy of all lists and collections in the configuration.
        Parameters:
        config - the configuration to make a copy of

    • Method Detail

      • createFrom

        public static NegotiationParty createFrom(PartyRepItem partyRepItem,
                          ProfileRepItem profileRepItem)
                                   throws java.lang.Exception
        Creates a new Party from repository items
        Parameters:
        partyRepItem - Party Repository item to createFrom party from
        profileRepItem - Profile Repository item to createFrom party from
        Returns:
        new Party
        Throws:
        java.lang.NoSuchMethodException - If requested Party does not have a constructor accepting only preference profiles
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - If requested Party class can not be found.
        java.lang.Exception - If Repository.copyFrom(negotiator.repository.Repository) throws an exception.

      • createFrom

        public static UtilitySpace createFrom(ProfileRepItem item)
                               throws java.lang.Exception
        Create a new UtilitySpace from a ProfileRepItem. If ProfileRepItem.getDomain() returns new instead of an actual domain, this method also returns null.
        Parameters:
        item - the item to create a UtilitySpace out of.
        Returns:
        the UtilitySpace corresponding to the item.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If Repository.copyFrom(negotiator.repository.Repository) throws an exception.
